name: Danganronpa: Trigger Happy Havoc On PSP (RUS)
name_original: Danganronpa: Trigger Happy Havoc On PSP (RUS)
description:
Danganronpa: Trigger Happy Havoc On PSP (RUS) is a strategy game developed by fredvinogradoff. It came out on 21-06-2022.
Danganronpa: Trigger Happy Havoc On PSP (RUS) is available on PC. The game is sold via itch.io.
